font.strong: Welcome to the Corsica-Stickney School Homepage

br.br:
Graduation Plans: Saturday May 16--4:30 PM Graduation Parade in Corsica down mainstreet
starting by the lumber yard and then exit down past leisure living and nursing
home(Homecoming Parade Route). Parade in Stickney at 5:15 PM starting at
the school down mainstreet and returning to the school(Homecoming Parade Route).
WE ASK ALL TO RESPECT SOCIAL DISTANCING FOR THE SAFETY OF ALL.
June 27 4:30 PM--We hope to have a form of traditional graduation ceremony
in the gym or outside at the High School in Corsica at 4:30 PM.
Meals: Available for students for pick-up from 11:45 AM to 12:15 PM in
Corsica(Commons Doors) and Stickney(Kitchen Window). These are free for PK-12th grade students.
They will be available Monday through Friday through May 20th.
Students: It is extremely important to stay current on your work.
Make sure your assignments are complete.
We are here to assist you, but you must be responsible in your communication.
Call/e-mail your instructor/principal if you need assistance/clarification to
complete an assignment rather than hand in incomplete.
Corsica-Stickney School will be having E-Learning/Correspondence/Flex School Work
at this time until May 20(End of School Year)
Return Week 5 Learning Assignments on Monday April 20 and
pick up your new learning information on Monday April 20 as well.
9:00 AM to 4:00 PM at your convenience.

p.strong:
Ending the 2019-20 School Year: Our last set of new assignments will go out on
May 4th to be returned tentatively by May 11th. From May 11th to May 20th
We will concentrate on any assignments not completed to date. Students with assignments
not completed from March 16th to May 11th should complete and submit them
to your instructor for evaluation. Students will have from May 11th to May 20th to complete
any of these assignments. If you need help your instructors will dedicate time to assist.
It important you successfully complete this school year and gain the necessary
skills to launch into the 20-21 school year.
Our last day of School for 2019-20 is May 20th.

span.strong:
In response to Governor Noem's direction of school closure through May 31st,
all SDHSAA spring sports
are cancelled for the remainder of this year.

p.strong:
All Activities through May 31 are Cancelled at this time
